item.description:
Members,

We will have our Boston Maltese Meet this coming Sunday on September 28th at Especially for Pets in Sudbury, 81 Union Ave, 978 443 7682.

Time will be 12 - 3 pm. We have to stop exactly at 3 pm because there is a dog class scheduled at 3pm. Thus clean up has to start at 2:30 and ALL help will be gratefully accepted!

In order to keep costs down, mine included since I have always managed to spend more money on food and rent than is taken in at the Meet, I would like to change to a POT LUCK format. If everyone that is coming can bring something, even a drink, or ice, or whatever, we will munch on those offerings. That way our Meet will only cost $5 per household so that we can pay the $45 in rent that Especially for Pets charges.

You can email me directly if you have questions about what to bring: laptopmaltese@aol.com.
But please do come, even if you cannot bring anything. We'd rather see you and your Maltese than not see you!!!!!!!!!

I look forward to our first Meet in four months!!!

Maltese best,
Kim
508 380 6829
item.how_to_find_us: I will have my name tag on which says Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: BOSTON MALTESE MEET
